title: I PUT MY HEXTECH ANNIE ON RENTAL AND CANT GET IT BACK HELP!!!
body: I opened a Hextech chest and I got Hextech Annie, I put the skin on rental because I didnt know I lose the shard by doing that. Is there any way to get it back =(

replies.body: mate it literally says (shard will be consumed) the place you click. read shit. lesson learned?
